Talk_63:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hey, buddy, we gotta face the facts here.
That thing's more monster than horse.<sp:0:4:0>And I can't board monsters. Sorry.
Talk_65:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS>Buddy, if you think that's a horse, then
I've got some news for you.<sp:0:4:0>Sorry, but stables are for horses only.
No exceptions.
Talk_66:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting>Just look at this gorgeous weather. It's
got the horses in a good mood too.
Talk_67:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting>Nice to see a friendly face come out of
this rain. The drizzle seems to calm the
horses too.
Talk_68:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting>Hey. Good of you to make it here in the
dark. Did the monsters give you any
trouble? Ya always gotta be careful.
Talk_69:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Wakeup_01>Mmm? Oh, hey. Didn't expect a visitor
this late.
Talk_110: See ya. Take care on the road.
Talk_50:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>OK then, as proof of your ownership,
why don't you give this one a name?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b00>Wait... Am I imagining things? No...
I can't believe this!<sp:0:4:0>Do you know who this horse is? She's the
legendary Epona!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>This is one special horse, buddy. There's
no way I'm gonna try to change her name.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>I can register her as "Epona," right?
Talk_51:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Go ahead and give this horse a
good name.
Talk_113:
You're on the stable-member list! Here,
I'll give you <clr:0000>one point<clr:ffff> to commemorate
your first visit to my humble stable.
Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I've got your horse all registered now.<sp:5:1:0>
Do you want to take it with you?
Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I get wanting to give her a name and all,
but... Buddy, work with me here.<sp:0:4:0>Can you imagine the lecture I'd get from
the Stable Association if I renamed a
legendary horse? Yeesh.
So can you just let me register her as
"Epona"? Please?
Talk_56: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Thanks for waiting. The horse is all yours.
Talk_57:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>That wraps things up on my end.
Be careful out there.
Talk_58:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, that reminds me...<sp:5:1:0> What do you know
about <clr:0000>whistling<clr:ffff>? <sp:5:0:0>It's the easiest way to
get your horse's attention!
If you ever lose sight of your horse, just
give it a <clr:0000>whistle<clr:ffff>, and it'll come running.
Talk_100:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I'll go ahead and tack<clr:0000> two points <clr:ffff>on to
your Pony Points card.
Talk_59:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Well, assuming you're close enough.
If you're too far away, your horse won't
be able to hear you.
Just be careful to stay nearby.
Talk_101:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>So you get a point for each new stable
you visit. Rest at one? Pony Point.
Register a horse? Point this guy up.
Save up enough points and you can earn
some mighty fine <clr:0000>rewards<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Not that this mini stable has any of
those on hand. You'll have to go to a
full-blown <clr:0000>stable <clr:ffff>to get 'em.
Talk_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_00>If you let a horse go, it's for keeps. You
won't see it again. You OK with that?
KyoukaiTalk04_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Notice_00>I'm impressed ya managed to tame that
golden horse...<sp:5:1:0> So, you wanna register it?
Talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>All right. I'm sure you're pretty beat up
about this, but try to stay strong.

<sp:3:0:2:0100>The Stable Association is going to take
good care of your new friend here, so
you can rest easy.
KyoukaiTalk04_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Notice_00>Wow,<sp:5:0:0> now that is one impressive horse.
Do you wanna register it?
Talk_42:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>OK then, all the prep work is done.
Let's get your new horse registered.
Talk_44: <sp:3:0:2:0101>Let's get this horse registered, shall we?
Talk_45:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>All righty, the administration fee for
registering your horse is <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>.
Is that OK?
Talk_107:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Sorry, I can't give ya any Pony Point
<clr:0000>rewards<clr:ffff> here. You'll have to do it at a
proper <clr:0000>stable<clr:ffff>.
Register00_4:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Hold up...<sp:5:1:0> Buddy,<sp:5:1:0> this horse...


Isn't this the <clr:0000>golden horse<clr:ffff> that ran away
from <clr:0000>Snowfield Stable<clr:ffff>?

You should be taking it back to<clr:0000> its
caregiver over there<clr:ffff>, not bringing
it to me!
Talk_46: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Looks like it's all here.<sp:5:1:0> Many thanks!
Talk_108:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Thanks, buddy!<sp:0:4:0>Normally I'd charge ya <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff> to
register a horse...<sp:0:4:0>But hey, the first one's <clr:0000>on the house<clr:ffff>.
Talk_47:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Buddy, don't tell me you don't have
<clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>...

Sorry, but I gotta ask ya to come back
once you've scraped up <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff>.
Register02: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad>Which horse do you want to release?
Talk_48:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Hang on, you're not going to register it?
Such a fine horse too. What a shame...
Import01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Huh.<sp:5:1:0> Our registry here says we've taken
care of a horse or two for you before.<sp:0:4:0>I'll get them registered here, so be sure
to swing by again and take a look!
Talk_49:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>OK, let's get this registration going.


Your horse will be with you through thick
and thin, so let's get you two properly
introduced. Give it a name!
Talk_91:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>That's a brand-new horse registration,
so I'll go ahead and add <clr:0000>one point<clr:ffff> to your
Pony Points card.
Talk_92:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice>Whoa, whoa, whoa, you're not a stable
<clr:0000>member<clr:ffff> yet?<sp:0:4:0>Let me fix that. Give me your name
and I'll get you all registered with the
Stable Association.
Talk_94:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>All right, thanks for stopping by.<sp:5:1:0> Come
back when you can!<sp:0:4:0><sp:5:0:0><sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice>Whoops,<sp:5:0:0> almost forgot. I haven't given
you your <clr:0000>Pony Points card<clr:ffff> yet, have I?
Talk_33: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>OK, I'll prep <clr:0000><sp:2:3:0><clr:ffff> for you.<sp:0:4:0>Just a moment.
Talk_95:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I'll go ahead and tack <clr:0000>one point<clr:ffff> on to
your Pony Points card.
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Thanks for waiting. Your horse sure seems
happy to see you!
Talk_96:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Members who visit stables and use their
services earn <clr:0000>points<clr:ffff>.
Register16_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Too bad.<sp:5:0:0> Would've been nice to take care
of the legendary golden horse, after all.
Talk_97:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, you do? Then I guess you just
dodged a lot of hot air.
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>What a great horse. Gonna be a pleasure
to look after.
Talk_98:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>On that note, you get a point for using
this <clr:0000>mini stable<clr:ffff> for the first time...
Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Notice_00>Oho! You brought a new steed! Want me
to register it for ya?
Talk_99:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>So you get one point for using this
<clr:0000>mini stable<clr:ffff> for the first time, and
another for <clr:0000>registering a horse<clr:ffff>...
Talk_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>You're not going to register it? Well,
follow your heart, I guess...
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Whoa, hold on... Buddy, you've already
got <sp:2:e:24:1e004f0077006e00610062006c00650048006f007200730065004e0075006d00ffff00cd> horses registered.<sp:5:0:0> Sorry, but that's
the most you can register right now.
If ya save up your Pony Points, you
can increase the number you can
register, but...<sp:5:1:0>
If you wanna register the horse you have
with you right now, you've gotta let
another one go.
Talk_81:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting>Sky sure is cloudy, huh? The horses are
loving the cool weather though.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hey, buddy, you wanna explain why
you're runnin' around like that? <sp:5:1:0>Well,
just don't catch a cold, OK?
Talk_84:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Well! It looks like you've built up a nice
little pile of points.

I wish I could give ya something, but if
you want rewards, you'll have to visit a
full-fledged <clr:0000>stable<clr:ffff>.
Talk_85:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Still got both your ears, or did I talk one
of 'em off?<sp:0:4:0>Anyway, let me know your name so I can
confirm that you're a stable member.
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think>Y'see, a full stable has workers ready to
<clr:0000>take care of horses<clr:ffff> and <clr:0000>lodgings<clr:ffff> so that
weary travelers can rest their heads.
But my mini stable here is a one-man
show, and I can only offer a few simple
comforts.
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This is my <clr:0000>mini stable<clr:ffff>. You got a horse
question? I got a horse answer.
Talk_87:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Come back whenever you wanna do
business. I'll be here with the horses.
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But I'm happy to help ya <clr:0000>register<clr:ffff>, <clr:0000>board<clr:ffff>,
or <clr:0000>take out a horse<clr:ffff>!
Talk_70:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>All right.<sp:5:1:0> I'll hold off on registering this
horse. Be sure to give the horses you
have some love too.
And remember, if you build up those
Pony Points, you can register even
more horses.
So be sure to keep lodging and riding
with the Stable Association!
Talk_71:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hang on there, buddy. You've already got
<sp:2:e:24:1e004f0077006e00610062006c00650048006f007200730065004e0075006d00ffff00cd> horses registered. <sp:5:0:0>Sorry, but we're
about as full up on horses as can be.
Do you want to let one of them go so you
can register the horse you have with you?
Talk_72:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Since you're a regular stable customer, I'll
give you <clr:0000>half off<clr:ffff> on the fee. So it'll only be
<clr:0000>10 rupees<clr:ffff>.
So how about it? Wanna register?
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You want to take out a horse, huh?
Which one would you like?
Talk_74:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think>I'm running this mini stable all on my
lonesome, so I can't offer as many
services as a <clr:0000>regular stable <clr:ffff>can.
Talk_76:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The closest one of those is probably
<clr:0000>Outskirt Stable northeast <clr:ffff>of here.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Wild horses are wary creatures.<sp:0:4:0>If you wanna get close, the trick is to
<clr:0000>crouch<clr:ffff> down and sneak up from <clr:0000>behind<clr:ffff>.
Talk_77:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Ease>Well, sure, if you wanna hear it again,
I'll tell ya as many times as ya want.
All part of the job.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey, buddy.<sp:5:1:0> If you're going to Gerudo
Canyon over the suspension bridge,
you'd better be careful.
I used to have a stable in the canyon...


<sp:3:0:2:0c00>But ever since the Upheaval sent the
weather all screwy, horses hate the place.<sp:0:4:0>No horses meant no travelers meant no
business for my stable. I was ruined.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0300>I had no choice but to relocate and
open a mini stable over here.<sp:0:4:0>But boy, do I miss the old spot...
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS>Hey, buddy, you wanna put on another
layer or two?
Talk_60:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hey... You don't even have a wild horse
with you right now.

Wild horses are very wary, so you need
to creep up on them from behind.

It's easier to catch them if you approach
while crouching, if you can.
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Sad>I heard a rumor that some so-called
"Demon King" has been revived.

Well, no matter what happens, I'll always
stick by the horses.
Talk_61:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Once you're riding and the horse settles
down enough to listen to your commands,
bring it to a <clr:0000>stable <clr:ffff>or <clr:0000>mini stable<clr:ffff>.
You can't make the horse <clr:0000>your own<clr:ffff> until
you <clr:0000>register<clr:ffff> it.
Talk_200:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The inn there's closed now, but if you're
gonna stop at <clr:0000>Gerudo Canyon Stable<clr:ffff>,
remember to be careful.
The Upheaval's turned the road leading
to it into a river. Getting there's sure to
be a rough journey.
Talk_62:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Buddy, don't tell me you don't have
<clr:0000>10 rupees<clr:ffff>...

Sorry, but I gotta ask ya to come back
once you've scraped up <clr:0000>10 rupees<clr:ffff>.
